text.title: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life

head.s: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child 's Life

p.s: If you do n’t think so , think back to your childhood days when you made meals out of dirt and water : Yummy MUD PIES …
Think back to times when your family was hungry and you had n’t gone shopping yet and you made real meals out of whatever was in your refrigerator .
That ’s simple creativity and some of the best recipes come from days like that ! You do n’t have to be born with paint running through your veins to be an artist .
When we open our hearts and lives to creativity , we also invite other feelings in like :

item.s: Stress reduction
Self expression
Inner peace
Increased confidence

p.s: As a parent , it is not only important for you to live a creative lifestyle , it is equally important for you to teach it to your children .
Your child ’s love for the arts will depend a lot upon how you feel about it .
Through the process of creating art , children can :

item.s: Increase their awareness of themselves and others
Learn how to control themselves
Cope with stress and negative experiences
Enjoy the pleasures of making art .
Always have on hand a variety of creative , artistic materials .
These materials can include , but are certainly not limited to , crayons , markers , paint , clay , various paper styles , glues , and scissors .

figure.rend: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life Step 1 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Let them experiment .

figure.rend: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Be specific with your encouragement .
Instead of simply saying “ I like your painting ” , say , “ I like how you used blue for the color of your sun , and the stripes on your frog are amazing ! ”

figure.rend: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Do n’t guess what their art is ; ask them to tell you about it .

figure.rend: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Choose a time and place without any interruptions .

figure.rend: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Do n’t rush their creativity .
If they are n’t finished in the time allotted , let them finish it later .
Be sure to follow through with the finish day and time you both decide on .

figure.rend: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Try not to introduce too much .
If the activity becomes too overwhelming , stop .
Remember it is supposed to be fun , so be patient with their learning abilities .

figure.rend: Incorporate Art Into Your Life and Into Your Child's Life Step 7 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Now , you are ready to make a self portrait of your creative self .
Here ’s how :
You will need a piece of paper for each person , and a pencil , scissors , glue , and magazines to share .
Have each person sketch themselves on their piece of paper ( simple head , with eyes , nose , mouth , etc. will do ) .
Cut magazine pages in various colors and small sizes .
This can be done ahead of time .
Form a background behind the sketch with magazine pieces glued down .
Next , have them glue pieces onto their self-portrait sketch .
Place the pieces so that they form the eyes , nose , mouth and hair .
Hello , creative you !
